page.title: 07A Day in the Life of ......
page.content: {Salome Stanford aged 10} I got up, Sunday 9th of June 1985 .I got dressed and went downstairs for breakfast it was 9 0'clock.After breakfast I went upstairs to clean my teeth. Later that morning my brother Mark and me, Alister and Heather Wilson , and Simon and Kerry Maskill went to the Rec to play cricket.After lunch I went to call for my friend Marie - Louise ,but she was out playing with someone.I went home.The rest of the afternoon I sat watching tennis.My brother went out to play yet more cricket. Then my friend Lisa came round and we played with my dog Bechy.Lisa went at 6.30 then I had my tea. At about 8.45 I went upstairs, got ready for bed,cleaned my teeth, and went to bed.
